This shameful act of defiance by Putin underscores the growing need for Congress to act on LNG exports .

Passage of Rep. Gardner 's bipartisan legislation , H.R. 6 , would send the clear signal that we are serious about enlarging the scope of natural gas exports , and immediately undercut Russia 's dominance .

A1: considerable benefits at home and abroad
RelatedSentence: The increased export of US LNG would have considerable benefits at home and abroad , however according to Upton , the US Department of Energy 's ( DOE ) slow approval process threatens this opportunity .
H.R. 6 , the Domestic Prosperity and Global Freedom Act , would help clear the backlog of export applications currently pending at DOE .
H.R. 6 , the Domestic Prosperity and Global Freedom Act , would help clear the backlog of export applications currently pending at DOE .
The legislation provides that DOE must issue a decision on any application no later than 90 days of enactment or the end of the application 's comment period .
The legislation provides that DOE must issue a decision on any application no later than 90 days of enactment or the end of the application 's comment period .
It also provides for expedited judicial review for challenges to DOE 's decision or inaction on these applications .
H.R. 6 was approved by Upton 's committee on 30 April 2014 , by a bipartisan vote of 33-18 and will be considered by the full House in the next few weeks .
